page.title: 01LIFE OF A TEENAGER
page.content: THE LIFE OF A TEENAGER.I live on a farm in Eyton.It is a mixed farm of dairy, beef and arable.My grandparents farmed there before my parents.We have 285 acres of land on which we farm.On school days I get up at 7.30 a.m..I get the taxi at 8.30 a.m. which takes me four miles to Ysgol Rhiwabon.At school we have registration, followed by lessons which start at 9.20..My first lesson on Monday is History.Then I have a fifteen minute break.Next I have English, then I have a lunch break of 55 minutes. After that we start lessons again.I have Personal and Social Development,followed by a ten minute break and my last lesson is Maths.I finish school at 3.30 p.m.At home,I watch t.v.,do my homework,go shooting wild pheasants in season or help my father on the farm.
